subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After talking with Greg Schiano of Rutgers and Mike Leach of Texas Tech, the Hurricanes selected Randy Shannon, who has been the team’s defensive coordinator the past six seasons, to be their next head coach.
snippet: After talking with Greg Schiano of Rutgers and Mike Leach of Texas Tech, the Hurricanes selected Randy Shannon, who has been the team’s defensive coordinator the past six seasons, to be their next head coach.
